ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib.renderers

Class ShaderRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hevs.gdx2d.lib.renderers.ShaderRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleShaderRenderer

    public class ShaderRenderer
extends Object
implements Disposable
    Render things using a GLSL shader program included in a file.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry

      • ShaderRenderer

        public ShaderRenderer(String shaderFileName,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Create a shader render from an existing shader file.
        Parameters:
        shaderFileName - the shader file name to renderer
        width - the shader width
        height - the shader height

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(int posX,
                   int posY,
                   float time)
        Render the shader.
        Parameters:
        posX - X center position of the texture shader to draw
        posY - Y center position of the texture shader to draw
        time - the time information to pass to the shader

      • addTexture

        public int addTexture(String texturePath,
                      String textureIdentifier)
        Adds a new texture from an image to the OpenGL pipeline. It is bound with a name and a number.
        Parameters:
        texturePath - The image to load as a texture
        textureIdentifier - The identifier uniform that will be passed to the shader
        Returns:
        The texture number that was created
